newsitem.title: FRANCE: French homeless occupy train station.
newsitem.headline: French homeless occupy train station.

text.p: Several hundred homeless people and charity workers occupied the main hall of the St Lazare railway station in central Paris on Sunday demanding that French authorities requisition empty flats for the homeless.
Eyewitnesses said the demonstrators laid out sleeping bags in the hall while others took over a train, preventing it from leaving.
Police brought up reinforcements but took no immediate action against the demonstrators.
